title: Project Sentience: Python FastAPI Sentiment Analysis API
description: This project aims to develop a robust and scalable Python API using FastAPI for analyzing and classifying text sentiment.  The API will leverage Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to accurately determine the sentiment expressed in given text, categorizing it as positive, negative, or neutral. The project will prioritize efficiency, accuracy, and maintainability, adhering to best practices in API design and development.  The API will be designed with scalability in mind, capable of handling high volumes of requests and adapting to future enhancements and evolving NLP models.  Comprehensive documentation will be provided for developers to easily integrate and utilize the API.

tasks.description: 1. Design the API endpoints for sentiment analysis, including input validation and output formatting
2. Select and integrate a suitable NLP library for sentiment analysis (e.g., NLTK, spaCy, Transformers)
3. Develop the core sentiment analysis logic, ensuring efficient and accurate classification
4. Implement comprehensive unit and integration tests to ensure the API's reliability and accuracy
5. Create Dockerfile and set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated builds and deployments
6. Develop API documentation using tools like Swagger or OpenAPI
7. Deploy the API to a cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)

title: Sales Velocity: Interactive SQL & Power BI Analytics Platform
description: This project aims to develop a robust and interactive Sales Performance Dashboard, leveraging SQL for efficient data extraction and transformation, and Power BI for intuitive data visualization and reporting. The dashboard will provide key stakeholders with critical insights into sales trends, regional performance, product-wise sales, and individual sales representative effectiveness through a suite of customizable Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and dynamic charts. Emphasis will be placed on data accuracy, efficient data refresh mechanisms, a user-friendly interface for seamless navigation, and a scalable architecture to accommodate future data growth and evolving business intelligence requirements. Comprehensive documentation for data models and dashboard configurations will ensure long-term maintainability.
